goals__remit: SIX operates the Swiss financial sector’s infrastructure and has an international presence with its services. Some 3,900 staff from 47 nations apply their specialist know-how and outstanding professionalism in 25 countries for the benefit of customers ranging from the world’s leading financial institutions to the smallest corner shops. SIX is globally unique in terms of both its structure and the scope of its services. Its integrated value chain comprises securities trading, settlement and custody, the collection and processing of financial information as well as cashless payments.  SIX’s core remit is to enhance the innovative power and efficiency of the Swiss financial sector and its participants throughout the world. This pivotal role is both a serious commitment and a source of strength for SIX. It ensures quality, reliability and a competitive edge in the global marketplace.
relevant_communication: Applications under MiFID2/MiFIR, EMIR and CSDR for recognition to provide trade, clearing, settlement and custody services into the EUt.
position: Director & Head of Group Public & Regulatory Affairs
